verses.verse: Or are ye <S%G50>ignorant<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G1063>(for<s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> to men who <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>), <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> hath dominion <S%G2961>over<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G3745>so<s%> <S%G5550>long<s%> time <S%G3745>as<s%> he <S%G2198>liveth<s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> that hath a <S%G5220>husband<s%> is <S%G1210>bound<s%> by <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G435>to<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> while he <S%G2198>liveth<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G599>die<s%>, she is <S%G2673>discharged<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G435>of<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%>.

So <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%>, <S%G2198>while<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G2198>liveth<s%>, she be <S%G1096>joined<s%> <S%G435>to<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G435>man<s%>, she shall be <S%G5537>called<s%> an <S%G3428>adulteress<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G599>die<s%>, she <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1658>free<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, so <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G846>she<s%> <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3428>adulteress<s%>, though she be <S%G1096>joined<s%> <S%G435>to<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G435>man<s%>.

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> were made <S%G2289>dead<s%> to the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>; <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> should be <S%G1096>joined<s%> to <S%G2087>another<s%>, even to him who was <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> we might bring forth <S%G2592>fruit<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> we <S%G1510>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, the <S%G266>sinful<s%> <S%G3804>passions<s%>, which <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G1754>wrought<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> bring forth <S%G2592>fruit<s%> unto <S%G2288>death<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> we have been <S%G2673>discharged<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, having <S%G599>died<s%> to that wherein1722, 3739 we were <S%G2722>held<s%>; so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2538>newness<s%> of the <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> in <S%G3821>oldness<s%> of the <S%G1121>letter<s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> shall we <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>? Is the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3361>sin<s%>? God <S%G1096>forbid<s%>. <S%G235>Howbeit<s%>, I <S%G1097>had<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G1487>sin<s%>, <S%G3361>except<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G1492>had<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1492>known<s%> <S%G1487>coveting<s%>, <S%G3361>except<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> had <S%G3004>said<s%>, Thou <S%G1937>shalt<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1937>covet<s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>, <S%G2983>finding<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%>, <S%G2716>wrought<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> all manner <S%G3956>of<s%> <S%G1939>coveting<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5565>apart<s%> from the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> is <S%G3498>dead<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> was <S%G2198>alive<s%> <S%G5565>apart<s%> from the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G4218>once<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2064>when<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%>, <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G326>revived<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G599>died<s%>;
and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>, this <S%G3427>I<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> to be <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>, <S%G2983>finding<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G1818>beguiled<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> slew <S%G615>me<s%>.

So <S%G5620><s%> that the <S%G3551>law<s%> is <S%G40>holy<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G18>good<s%>.

Did <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> that which is <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> unto <S%G3361>me<s%>? God <S%G1096>forbid<s%>. <S%G235>But<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> it might be <S%G5316>shown<s%> to be <S%G266>sin<s%>, by <S%G2716>working<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> that which is <S%G18>good<s%>; â€” <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> might become1096, 2596 <S%G5236>exceeding<s%> <S%G268>sinful<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4559>carnal<s%>, <S%G4097>sold<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2716>do<s%> I <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> not <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%>, <S%G5124>that<s%> do <S%G4238>I<s%> <S%G3756>practise<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G3404>hate<s%>, <S%G5124>that<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%>.

But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1161>what<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>, <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G5124>I<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%>, I consent <S%G4852>unto<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it is <S%G2570>good<s%>.

So <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> it is no <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3765>that<s%> <S%G2716>do<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> which <S%G3611>dwelleth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>, <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G3611>dwelleth<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> good <S%G18>thing<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> to <S%G2309>will<s%> is <S%G3873>present<s%> with <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> to <S%G2716>do<s%> that which is <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2147>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>, <S%G5124>that<s%> I <S%G4238>practise<s%>.

I <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%>, <S%G2309>to<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G3754>who<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%>, <S%G2556>evil<s%> is <S%G3873>present<s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G4913>delight<s%> in the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G444>the<s%> <S%G2080>inward<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G991>see<s%> a <S%G2087>different<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%>, warring <S%G497>against<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3563>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3563>mind<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G163>bringing<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> into <S%G163>captivity<s%> under the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> which <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%>.

Wretched <S%G5005><s%> <S%G444>man<s%> that I <S%G1473>am<s%>! <S%G5101>who<s%> shall <S%G4506>deliver<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>?

I <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>. <S%G686>So<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> of <S%G846>myself<s%> with the <S%G3563>mind<s%>, <S%G1398>indeed<s%>, serve the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> with the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%>.
